channel.title: [317] dragzscape [317]downloaded 9245 times
channel.description:
[size=15pt] 9245 downloads.[/size] :D to anyone who's wondering about what client to use i suggest using the silabsoft client or something similar. you can download the silabsoft client here (i hope you dont mind me posting this link) http://uppit.com/hcpwwerex92r/silabsoft.rar
hello this is my first ever release i haven't really been working on it much and can't be botherd to do anything else with it. it doesn't need a custom client so silabs is fine to play it on. This source is great for someone looking for the old classic type of server, and for begginers.you may say this server is nothing special and i dont care because i know it isnt i was just bored and made it.(thanks to the maker of reapagev2 and silabsoft.)
The server has:
[ul][li]control panel.(with added punishment tab)[/li] [li]all working skills.[/li] [li]decent training.[/li] [li]anti spamming and SYIpkpker.[/li] [li]no pointless commands like ::weed and stuff.[/li] [li]good economy.[/li] [li]some never seen before areas for shops, training and so on..[/li] [li]very unique training system. consists of 4 different areas each needing certain levels to enter. each level has higher level monsters, and better drops. The final level of training has a killcount system, when you have enough points you can buy a barrelchest anchor.[/li] [li]and the original classic things you would exspect.[/li] [li]and much much much much much much much more[/li][/ul]
now for some pictures. i cant be botherd to take many at the moment. ill take more later...
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/training1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/training2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/training3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/training4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/anchorchestnopoints.jpg[/img] anchor chest with not enough points. [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/anchorchestanchorbought.jpg[/img] chest after you have enough points. [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/1v1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/controlpanel.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/crazypking.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/home.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/theshoppingarea.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/woodcutting.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/slayer.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/miningandsmithing.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/specials.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/crafting.jpg[/img]
now for the almighty link..:::... http://uppit.com/v/FC2JBP1X ..... ..:::...http://www.mediafire.com/?xmyztn0gmjm.....
enjoy this server :))))
if this server is posted by anyone but me please private message me, also i will be happy to help you if you have any problems with my server.

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“kickingjamie, post:348, topic:314178”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=410658.msg3514453#msg3514453 date=1298844386]

do people still like this kind of server? i’m thinking of starting back up and i need suggestions on what Deob to start with. 317 are boring but i think i can do good things with them however i think i should change to something less familer like 508/525 where i can learn some new things. what do you lot suggest?

Gravedigger

I suggest a 317, but don’t add higher deob items into it, for example - summoning. If you want summoning in your server, get a 508 or whatever deob has it.
[/quote]
custom client or stick with silabsoft client or moparscape client? they both support 317 but are not customisable.[/quote]

Maybe a customized client, that way you can edit things that you want to edit… Only if you want to.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] dragzscape [317]downloaded 9245 times
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:334, topic:314178”]Soooo many ways to say this is a worthless piece of shit and you need to correct a lot of things…
sigh
Let’s begin.

First picture, you spelled anchor wrong, stupid fuck.
http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/anchorchestnopoints.jpg

Second, spelled proper wrong, idiotic fuck.
http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/crafting.jpg

Third, the shopping area looks like a clump of sperm that comes out of my cock.
http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/theshoppingarea.jpg

Fourth, I bet if you alch these capes or sell them you could make a fortune off of them.
http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/home.jpg

Fifth, I done lose items here?
http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/1v1.jpg

Sixth, why put a period THEN an exclamation point? Any certain reason? Yeah, it’s a little thing that makes me wonder “how the fuck do people code these things when they can’t spell simple words right and they use .!s?”
http://i483.photobucket.com/albums/rr200/kickingjamie/training4.jpg

Seventh, people actually like commands like “::weed” dumb ass, who wouldn’t enjoy getting high on a private server?
“no pointless commands like ::weed and stuff.”

Eighth, I hate faggots who do “Owner (whatever)” or “Mod (whatever)” it just makes you look like a really fat hooker.

Ninth… Fine, I’ll let you slip on ninth and on, stuff like this goes to all you stupid wannabe fucks out there.[/quote]
to be honest i think someones mad ^

wow get a life you sad person, you are saying this is shit because of some spelling mistakes? find something that actually prooves this is a bad server instead of some stupid spelling mistakes please. does it really matter if i spelt anchor wrong? you still knew what i was talking about. also the owner and mod point is just fucking stupid does it really matter what my username is on my own server? also voting on your server gets you 25m? niceee mate. one more thing : you are calling me a wannabe? i dont have a clue who you are and as far as i know you are some retard wannabe troll who thinks hes server is the best when really your players don’t vote for the quality of your server all they vote for is the 25m you other upon voting, and your calling my server shit because you can alch skillcapes and maybe gain 99k per alch?

[quote=“morterdestroyer, post:337, topic:314178”]LEECH[/quote]i hope your not calling me a leecher…

Read full topic
